doc:
Lori Shannon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lori_Shannon 0 Lori Shannon (May 18, 1938 - February 13, 1984), born Don Seymour McLean, was an openly gay female impersonator who was associated with the drag revues at Finocchio's club in San Francisco. He wrote an entertainment column for the Bay Area Reporter. Lori_Shannon ( May_18_,_1938 - February_13_,_1984 ) , born Don_Seymour_McLean , was an_openly_gay_female_impersonator who was_associated with the_drag_revues at Finocchio 's_club in San_Francisco . He wrote an_entertainment_column for the_Bay_Area_Reporter .
